ygData.msgSnippet: Dear Prof.Godwin, when I use the function getEquilibriumConstants() in loops while advancing an adiabatic reactor, sometimes I get the following error:

Dear Prof.Godwin,

when I use the function getEquilibriumConstants() in loops while
advancing an adiabatic reactor, sometimes I get the following error:

Procedure: setState_UV 
Error:     no convergence. dt = -100
u = -24.3091 v = 5.31394e-006

My analysis shows that this happens when the mixture is near
equilibrium. Why does the temperature calculation not converge, when
it isn't really changing ?

best regards
ulf
